Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Service Delayed at Midway
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing at Midway due to a signal problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing at Midway due to a signal problem. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
